name: Deadly Delivery
description:
While delivering a package, you got trapped in a psychiatric hospital by a crazy doctor. Your objective is to find a way to escape.

Collect keys

There are locked areas and rooms in the hospital. You will need to collect keys to unlock them.

Check the cameras

The crazy doctor will look for you. But you can use the cameras to find where he is and avoid him.

Escape

Once you find the key to the entrance, you can escape. Or is there another way to escape this situation?
